thread.title: Texas Tech Men's basketball tickets up for sale

author: Taylor Langston
title: Texas Tech Men's basketball tickets up for sale
text: Texas Tech Men's basketball tickets up for sale LUBBOCK, Texas – The Texas Tech Athletics Ticket Office announced Monday that the Red Raider 4 Pack is now on-sale for the upcoming 2015-16 men’s basketball season.Fans can purchase the Red Raider 4 Pack for $49 online at www.TexasTech.com, in person at the Texas Tech Athletics Ticket Office now located on the East Side of Jones AT&T Stadium or via the phone at (806) 742-8324.The Red Raider 4 Pack allows fans to choose a ticket for either the Kansas (Jan. 9 – 8 p.... LCU Goalkeeper receives conference honor The Heartland Conference announced it's players of the week Monday, naming LCU's Goalkeeper Leslie Castellano the Defensive Player of the Week.Castellano is a 2008 graduate of Coronado High School, in her senior season with the Lady Chaps.
